scripts.build-image: docker build -t dashboard-ui:dev --build-arg NEXT_PUBLIC_AUTH_URL='/oauth2/authorization/keycloak' --build-arg NEXT_PUBLIC_PERENCANAAN='/perencanaan' --build-arg NEXT_PUBLIC_REALISASI='/realisasi' --build-arg NEXT_PUBLIC_BRANDING_TITLE='E-MANER' --build-arg NEXT_PUBLIC_BRANDING_CLIENT_NAME='KOTA SEMARANG v2' --build-arg NEXT_PUBLIC_LOGO_URL='https://cdnkk.zeabur.app/api/cdn/download/images/universal.png' .
